rules_text:
{W}, Exile an artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard: You gain 3 life.
{2}{U}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Draw a card.
{4}{B}, Exile a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token with three +1/+1 counters on it.
